snippet.title: Overblood ~ Trailer
snippet.description: The Trailer FMV from Riverhill's charmingly clunky, yet atmospheric, 1996 PS1 Horror Adventure, Overblood. As Raz Karcy you abruptly awaken from a cryopod to find yourself suffering from amnesia and fungal infection in a crumbling underground laboratory. Together with your newly found robot friend Pipo, you must escape this deathtrap and uncover your past in the process.
